title: Post claiming Poe paid rebel groups P20M NEEDS CONTEXT
subtitle: The Facebook post singled out reelectionist senator Grace Poe for allegedly giving the New People’s Army P20 million, based on one news report in April quoting a certain “Ka Nonoy Alcantara” that claimed five senate bets paid leftist, communist and rebel groups in exchange for an endorsement.
author: tsek.ph
vclaim:
The Facebook post singled out reelectionist senator Grace Poe for allegedly giving the New People’s Army P20 million, based on one news report in April quoting a certain “Ka Nonoy Alcantara” that claimed five senate bets paid leftist, communist and rebel groups in exchange for an endorsement.

The five senatorial candidates--Poe, Paolo Benigno “Bam” Aquino IV, Nancy Binay, Serge Osmena and Erin Tanada-- are all endorsed by the Makabayan bloc. In a phone interview with VERA Files, the group denied knowing Alcantara who also claimed to be a "political officer of the Makabayan coalition" according to the report.

Only senators Aquino and Binay and senatorial candidate Tañada have issued statements denying the accusation.
